name: Smart Home Ipad App UI
description:
Hello Figma Community !! This is a final interface of my most recent UX Case Study about smart home users, hope u guys enjoy it and maybe this can be really useful for the actual smart home community.


Recently i made a UX Case Study about smart home users and i found out that the users is frequently having issues with their smart home control panels interface. The main problem i found is that the users are aways trying to found a software or a interface for manage their devices around the house, and the interfaces that already exists in the market are not made using user centered designs, so the users are frequently having problems with their interfaces and trying another interfaces. So i made a research to get into the user's context of use than i can empathyze they and understand their problems so i can try to solve it. 


If you guys enjoyed this project maybe you can nominate this for the Figma Awards !! ( if you think it deserves ) : )
